# Molybdenum Disilicide Furnace for Polymer Pre-Ceramic Pyrolysis

### Event Overview
The present tender invitation pertains to the procurement of a Molybdenum Disilicide Furnace for polymer pre-ceramic pyrolysis. The requirement was initially made public in an RFP (Request for Proposal) document published on Buy and Sell Canada, catering to Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI. Given the scope of the procurement and the solicitation methods employed, this document outlines key specifications, procedural guidelines, and mandatory pre-requisites.

### Background

In correspondence with the requirements outlined under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI, only suppliers who have been pre-qualified for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies through Public Works and Government Services Canada have been invited to submit a proposal.

### Purchaser Information
Invited suppliers will be required to submit their proposals before the stipulated closing date. Note, however, that suppliers who have not undergone prequalification under the supply arrangement are ineligible to submit bids and subsequently, their proposals will not be evaluated.

Prospective suppliers are invited to fulfill the required prequalification processes by downloading and submitting a response to solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C, accessible through Buyandsell.gc.ca.

### Tender Description

The following requirements have been highlighted for the evaluation and purchase of the Molybdenum Disilicide Furnace for polymer pre-ceramic pyrolysis:

* Item: Molybdenum disilicide Furnace for polymer pre-ceramic pyrolysis
* Quantity: 1

Pursuant to the terms and conditions of the supply arrangement, thirty days must elapse before any prospective bidders can offer. Bids originating from suppliers who possess a valid Free Trade Agreement Contract number will qualify for acceptance for a six-month period (95 calendar days)from the notice closing date.

### Attachment Details
None of the attachments are required for this purchase order.
